name: ‘Udev-notify’ provides Ubuntu notifications when connecting USB peripherals
caption: www.omgubuntu.co.uk
description: Whilst the name of this app isn't the most memorable, what it does is.    By default Ubuntu provides no feedback whether the connection of a peripheral  device - such as a webcam or usb thumbdrive - has succeed or failed. Windows, for example, uses a set of audio notifications to relay such status.
